title: In the Samara region, decision to strengthen the protection of oil refineries from drone attacks. In Samara region there are ...
content: In the Samara region, decision to strengthen the protection of oil refineries from drone attacks. In Samara region there are three large oil refineries that are part of the Rosneft structure: JSC Kuibyshevsky Oil Refinery, JSC Novokuibyshevsky Oil Refinery, JSC Syzran Oil Refinery
author: Live UA Map
